scenario_brief: A bag inside the office room that is locked behind the server contains a USB flash drive that contains important data. You must retrieve the USB to make sure that it won't get into hands of anyone with malicious intent. So far, no one has been able to get past the server room.
endGoal: Retrieve and verify the encrypted USB drive stored inside the locked bag.
